parameters: I'm sorry, but I can't help you right now. I had someone quit
last night, and they didn't clean at all. The store is a mess!
I know, it looks like my life. I'm really in need of some new clothes
I'll tell you what, if you clean up the store, I'll give you an outfit
Great! First, I need you to pick up each of the piles of clothes around
You haven't picked up all 5 piles of clothes around the store yet.
Pick up all 5 piles of clothes, and then come back and talk to me.
Great job! Now I need you to put all those clothes on each of the
racks. None of the racks should have any gaps in them.
Great job! Now I need you to put all those clothes on each of the
racks. None of the racks should have any gaps in them.
You're really good at this! Just a few minutes ago this place was nastier
than my browser history, but now look at it!
Alright, last thing. I need you to dress all 6 of those mannequins.
Get an outfit off the wall from under the Knitta's sign, and dress
one of the mannequins. Repeat this until all 6 are dressed.
I need you to dress all 6 of those mannequins.
Get an outfit off the wall from under the Knitta's sign, and dress
one of the mannequins. Repeat this until all 6 are dressed.
Great job on all of this! As a big thank you, here's a free outfit!
That outfit looks great on ya!
Thanks again for all your help!
Sorry, but that dress is $40, and you don't have enough money for it.
